sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_gf.PopulateQualitativeChoiceFieldHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PopulateQualitativeChoiceFieldHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PopulateQualitativeChoiceFieldHelper = Class.create();
PopulateQualitativeChoiceFieldHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getChoiceList(choiceSetSysId) {
        var choiceSetId = choiceSetSysId ? choiceSetSysId : this.getParameter('sysparm_choice_set');
        var choiceListObj = sn_gf.GFUtil.getChoiceListForUnit(choiceSetId);
        return (choiceListObj) ? JSON.stringify(choiceListObj) :
            JSON.stringify({
                'label': gs.getMessage('None'),
                'value': ''
            });
    },

    getOnlyChoiceValueList: function(choiceSetSysId) {
        var choiceListJson = JSON.parse(this.getChoiceList(choiceSetSysId));
        var key = null;
        var choiceListArray = [];
        for (key in choiceListJson) {
            if (choiceListJson[key]['value'] == '')
                choiceListArray.push(null);
            else
                choiceListArray.push(choiceListJson[key]['value']);
        }
        return choiceListArray;
    },

    type: 'PopulateQualitativeChoiceFieldHelper'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-06-14 08:44:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>33ec46a353db2110c627ddeeff7b12ee</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PopulateQualitativeChoiceFieldHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Goal Framework" source="sn_gf">11879041532030103913ddeeff7b12d8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Goal Framework">11879041532030103913ddeeff7b12d8</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_33ec46a353db2110c627ddeeff7b12ee</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-12 11:09:33</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
